channel.title: Shop error
channel.description:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -127 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17987) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16769) at client.packetSending(client.java:16722) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49)
